message_export_error: There was a problem while exporting data.
message_login: In order to access administration area for this site you need to enter correct username and password. System is case sensitive!
message_login_ok: You were successfully logged in. Please wait while being redirected!
message_logout: You are about to logout from the system. Are you sure?
message_module_disable: The following module will be disabled. This operation will remove all module specific settings. Are you sure?
message_module_initialise: The following module will be initialised. After this operation is completed module will have access to your database and files. Are you sure?
message_module_initialised: Module is now initialised and activated.
message_module_not_active: Module is not active. You can't disable inactive module!
message_module_protected: This module is protected. You are not allowed to change it.
message_no_captcha: Captcha module is not active. This module is required for low level access services exposed to the public.
message_no_contact_form: Contact form module is not active. In order for system to use email notifications you need to activate this module.
message_no_user: Specified user account could not be found on the system.
message_password_change: You need to enter your old password to ensure the right person is changing it. Please note that new password must be at least 6 characters long. Passwords are case sensitive!
message_password_recovery_email_sent: Email with instructions has been sent.
message_password_reocvery_email_error: There was a problem sending recovery email. Please try again later.
message_users_delete: You are about to remove the following user from the system. User will loose all data associated with this account. Are you sure?
message_users_error_duplicate: Unable to create new user. Specified username or email already exists.
message_users_error_level_too_high: Error saving user data. You can not assign level higher than your own.
message_users_error_premature_submission: Unable to create account. Data was submitted too fast.
message_users_error_user_level_higher: Error saving user data. Specified user has higher access than you.
title: Administration Suite
